person.note: Cheng(1) Minzheng [29602] His jinshi is recorded in Huizhou FZ, 6.29b. He also has a biography in Huizhou FZ, 7.67b-69a, his son is listed as a Xiuning Xian army officer, his father's jinshi is recorded in both the Hejian FZ and Huizhou FZ, and his grandfather and great grandfather are both listed with posthumous titles in the Huizhou FZ. In his wenji, he clearly continues to maintain the Huizhou connection and we geo-reference his titles to both Hejian Xian and to Xiuning Xian, but assume that the Huizhou FZ entries are anachronistic. Hejian FZ (1540), 23.4b, 24.13a. MS, 286.7343-7344.
